charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1101_0100:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] received a
message from Sophocles, asking to
meet up in the caves.
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0402_0600:
Eeek! Don’t just shout like that all of a sudden, OK?
You almost gave me a heart attack!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_0700:
S-so anyway...the reason I asked you to
meet me here today is because I have
a favor to ask.
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_0800:
You know how I’m not very good at talking
to other people, right? Well...I want you to
help me overcome that.
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0401_1000:
Phew! Thank you!
So you’ll help me, then?
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0302_1100: What do you need me to do?
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0402_1200:
Oh! So you’ll help me, then?
Thank you!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_1300:
So...it’s really dark in here, plus we’re
standing far away from each other,
so it’s not that hard for me to talk right now.
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_1400:
But if we get really close, I’ll get
nervous and I won’t be able to talk...
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_1500:
So, if it’s OK with you, I want you to
move closer to me little by little...
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0401_1700:
Oh...OK. That’s weird. I don’t feel nervous.
Maybe I’ll be OK around you!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0401_1800: I think I want to try getting closer...
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0401_1900:
N-nope! Never mind! Bad idea!
Eeek...now we’re face-to-face...
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0401_2000:
I’m a little uncomfortable like this, so I’m just
gonna avert my eyes for a minute, OK?
It’s not because I don’t like you. I promise.
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0302_2100: I’m just gonna rush up to you, OK?
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0402_2300:
I th-thought I told you little by little!
When you’re this close, I just... I can’t... Eeek!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0402_2400:
Unless we get to be as good of friends as
me and Togedemaru or Big Mo, being this
close is just bad, bad news for me...
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_2500:
The PML is all about team battling, so I want to
learn how to be more outgoing, but at this rate,
I’ll never be able to overcome my nerves...
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_2600:
If it comes down to it, I guess I’ll just
have to rely on the power of science
to get me through this!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_2700:
I actually programmed a new function
into my Poryphone, just in case!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_2800:
I call it the Don’t Avert Your Eyes,
You Scaredy-Cat! Mark III.
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_2900:
Once I turn this little function on...
There we go! Now there’s no going back!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_3000:
If I get nervous and try to look away or
retreat—even a little bit—I’ll get an electric
shock from the machine! Pretty nifty, huh?
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_3100:
I programmed in an Electrode mode
and a Stunfisk mode...
Which one do you think I should use?
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0401_3300:
Are you familiar with Electrode, the
Ball Pokémon? It likes to explode for
fun in its spare time. Pretty intense...
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0402_3500:
Are you familiar with Stunfisk, the
Trap Pokémon? It grins and laughs
whenever it shocks others. Ruthless...
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_3600:
Well, let’s give it a whirl!
Just a tiny bit...
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_3900:
T-Togedemaru! Don’t make loud, sudden
noises like that, please! You almost
gave me a heart attack!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0401_4100:
Wha—! I told you that I get scared
easily by loud noises, didn’t I?!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0402_4300:
W-well, I told you that I get scared
easily by loud noises, didn’t I?!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_4500:
Wait a sec...
I didn’t feel an electric shock.
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_4600:
Do you think maybe Togedemaru
absorbed the electricity from my machine?
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0301_4700: Well, you did seem a bit reckless.
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0401_4800:
Y-yeah, I guess you’re right. She must have
done it to protect me! Thanks, Togedemaru!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0302_4900: Maybe she was worried about you.
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0402_5000:
Y-yeah, I guess you’re right. She must have
done it to protect me! Thanks, Togedemaru!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_5100: I can always count on you!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_5200:
I should thank you too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I wasn’t able to overcome my nervousness
in the end, but I appreciate your help anyway!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0401_5400:
Hey, I just realized something! For the last couple
minutes, I haven’t felt nervous at all while
talking to you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0302_5500: You don’t look too nervous right now.
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0402_5600:
Hey...you’re right! Now that you mention it,
I don’t think I’ve felt nervous at all in the
last couple minutes while talking to you!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_5700:
Awesome! Maybe I leveled up a little bit
today after all!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_5800:
Maybe soon we’ll be able to have a
conversation in the light, too!
That would be awesome.
